def_en: If someone condescends to do something, they agree to do it, but in a way which shows that they think they are better than other people and should not have to do it.

def_cn: 表现出高人一等;盛气凌人
def_en: If you say that someone condescends to other people, you are showing your disapproval of the fact that they behave in a way which shows that they think they are superior to other people.
